## Codifying patient outcomes in kidney disease

The *epocakir* package makes clinical coding in kidney disease using clinical practice guidelines easy. 
The guidelines used are the [KDIGO guidelines](https://kdigo.org/guidelines/).

## Installation

<!-- CRAN
You can install the **releas** version from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("epocakir")
```
-->
You can install the **development** version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("alwinw/epocakir")
```
